review_text: Was in Montreal for a week of Just For Laughs festival and visited this place almost nightly. Great venue for a comedy show, it held a few thousand people max and the sound was clear and crisp. The area was surrounded with many stations for children of all ages to keep everyone busy. Not sure if it's always like this, or because the JFL's was in town, regardless it was a beautiful place to enjoy our evenings.
Amazing arena. There is always some kind of activities going on. It gets busy during the summer.

Montr√©al en Lumiere is a fun festival for families, visitors, and locals. It has entertainment for children, food and drinks for foodies, a ferris wheel, a zip line!, live show and music. La nuit Blanche is Saturday, goes till 3 am!
